title: Leaves Cave · Divine Blood Story Spreads

scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音，欢迎回来。第52集:离开山洞·神血之事流传。

scenes.description: 韩立在洞窟中一感应到此变化,心中一喜。但又等了数月后,才在某日双目一睁,一拳击碎洞口碎石,人才缓缓走了出来。

visual.composition: Han Li in cave senses this change, heart happy, but waits another few months, then one day eyes open, one punch shatters cave entrance rubble, person slowly walks out
visual.character_pose: Han Li breaking out, walking out

scenes.prompt: Han Li in cave senses this change, heart happy, but waits another few months, then one day eyes open, one punch shatters cave entrance rubble, person slowly walks out.
scenes.narration: 韩立在洞窟中一感应到此变化,心中一喜,但又等了数月后才在某日一拳击碎洞口碎石。

scenes.description: 他看了看附近一切,并未任何异样变化后,当即嘿嘿一笑的袖袍一甩,大步流星的直奔山下而去。

visual.composition: He looks around nearby everything, no abnormal changes, immediately hehe smiles sleeve flicks, strides directly down mountain

scenes.prompt: He looks around nearby everything, no abnormal changes, immediately hehe smiles sleeve flicks, strides directly down mountain.
scenes.narration: 他看了看附近一切,并未任何异样变化后,当即嘿嘿一笑,大步流星的直奔山下而去。

scenes.description: 不久,他身形就在山林中消失的无影无踪。

visual.composition: Not long, his figure in forest disappears without trace

scenes.prompt: Not long, his figure in forest disappears without trace.
scenes.narration: 不久,他身形就在山林中消失的无影无踪,彻底摆脱了追踪。

scenes.description: 一年后,落日之城较近一座小城中,到来了一名面孔陌生的青年炼体士。他匆匆的采购了一批东西后,就扬长而去,不知所踪了。

visual.composition: One year later, near Sunset City small city, arrives unfamiliar young body cultivator, he hurriedly purchases batch things, then leaves, whereabouts unknown
visual.character_pose: Han Li disguised as young body cultivator, shopping

scenes.prompt: One year later, near Sunset City small city, arrives unfamiliar young body cultivator, he hurriedly purchases batch things, then leaves, whereabouts unknown.
scenes.narration: 一年后,落日之城较近一座小城中,到来了一名面孔陌生的青年炼体士,匆匆采购后离开。

scenes.description: 因为最终没有追回东西,故而有关神血的事情还是渐渐流传了开来。

visual.composition: Because ultimately didn't recover things, so about divine blood matters gradually spread

scenes.prompt: Because ultimately didn't recover things, so about divine blood matters gradually spread.
scenes.narration: 因为最终没有追回东西,故而有关神血的事情还是渐渐流传了开来,引发轰动。

scenes.description: 再加上当时参加过三族大战的一些修士和炼体士也逐渐证明了此事,此事着实一连轰动了数年。

visual.composition: Plus at that time participated in three races battle some cultivators and body cultivators gradually proved this matter, this matter really shocked for years

scenes.prompt: Plus at that time participated in three races battle some cultivators and body cultivators gradually proved this matter, this matter really shocked for years.
scenes.narration: 再加上参加过三族大战的修士和炼体士逐渐证明了此事,此事着实一连轰动了数年。

scenes.description: 黄粱灵君等炼虚级出手的情况下,东西还让一名区区化神修士夺取了,自然让人啧啧称奇不已。

visual.composition: Huangliang Spirit Lord and other Refining Void level took action, thing still let mere Deity Transformation cultivator snatch, naturally makes people marvel

scenes.prompt: Huangliang Spirit Lord and other Refining Void level took action, thing still let mere Deity Transformation cultivator snatch, naturally makes people marvel.
scenes.narration: 黄粱灵君等炼虚级出手的情况下,东西还让一名区区化神修士夺取了,自然让人称奇不已。

scenes.description: 黄粱灵君仍有些不甘心,在回到落日城后,仍一连好几年的追查此事,对于夺宝修士身份也下了一番心思的去寻找。

visual.composition: Huangliang Spirit Lord still somewhat unwilling, after returning to Sunset City, still several years investigating this matter, for treasure snatcher's identity also put effort searching

scenes.prompt: Huangliang Spirit Lord still somewhat unwilling, after returning to Sunset City, still several years investigating this matter, for treasure snatcher's identity also put effort searching.
scenes.narration: 黄粱灵君仍有些不甘心,在回到落日城后,仍一连好几年的追查此事,寻找夺宝修士身份。

scenes.description: 结果让他无奈之极,夺宝之人显露的几种神通,个个都非同小可,但却仿佛是从石头中蹦出来的一般,竟然丝毫线索没有。

visual.composition: Result makes him extremely helpless, treasure snatcher revealed several divine abilities, each extraordinary, but seems like jumped out from stone, actually no clues at all

scenes.prompt: Result makes him extremely helpless, treasure snatcher revealed several divine abilities, each extraordinary, but seems like jumped out from stone, actually no clues at all.
scenes.narration: 结果让他无奈之极,夺宝之人显露的几种神通都非同小可,但却丝毫线索没有。

scenes.description: 再过一两年后,黄粱灵君离开了落日城,和那寰天奇相约去了蛮荒世界,就没人再关注此话题,神血之事就这般不了了之了。

visual.composition: After another one two years, Huangliang Spirit Lord leaves Sunset City, with Huan Tianqi goes to barbarian wilderness, no one pays attention to this topic, divine blood matter just fades away

scenes.prompt: After another one two years, Huangliang Spirit Lord leaves Sunset City, with Huan Tianqi goes to barbarian wilderness, no one pays attention to this topic, divine blood matter just fades away.
scenes.narration: 再过一两年后,黄粱灵君离开了落日城,和寰天奇相约去了蛮荒世界,神血之事不了了之。

scenes.description: 数年后,在远离人烟的一处高大巍峨巨山的山腹中,一个四周漆黑如墨的空间中,一个人影静静的盘坐里面,身上金光微微闪动着不停。

visual.composition: Several years later, in remote towering mountain's belly, space pitch black, person figure quietly sits inside, body golden light slightly flashing continuously
visual.environment: Dark cave in mountain, golden light
visual.character_pose: Han Li sitting, golden light flashing

scenes.prompt: Several years later, in remote towering mountain's belly, space pitch black, person figure quietly sits inside, body golden light slightly flashing continuously.
scenes.narration: 数年后,在远离人烟的一处高大巍峨巨山的山腹中,一个人影静静的盘坐里面,身上金光闪烁。

scenes.description: 在人影一旁却放着一个血红小瓶,横躺在地上,仿佛里面已经空空如也了。

visual.composition: Beside person figure lies blood red small bottle, lying on ground, seems inside already empty

scenes.prompt: Beside person figure lies blood red small bottle, lying on ground, seems inside already empty.
scenes.narration: 在人影一旁却放着一个血红小瓶,横躺在地上,仿佛里面已经空空如也了。

scenes.description: 盘坐人影却只是动也不动,要不是轻轻起伏的胸脯,就仿佛泥雕一般。

visual.composition: Sitting person figure just doesn't move, if not for gently rising falling chest, seems like mud statue
visual.character_pose: Han Li still, only chest moving

scenes.prompt: Sitting person figure just doesn't move, if not for gently rising falling chest, seems like mud statue.
scenes.narration: 盘坐人影却只是动也不动,要不是轻轻起伏的胸脯,就仿佛泥雕一般。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath night, spiritual light raining from the heavens
visual.environment: Night sky, city silhouette, floating light particles

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mysterious atmosphere, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第53集即将开始。
